actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the discharge of home mortgage loans will not be treated as income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any amount received by reason of the discharge of a home mortgage loan.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the discharge of home mortgage loans will not be treated as income.
